Generation V.Black: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
Generation V.White: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
Generation V.Black 2: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its prey's location and state.
Generation V.White 2: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its prey's location and state.

Generation VI.X: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
Generation VI.Y: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

Generation VIII.Sword: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.
